about_the_game:
In the dark age, the world is full of innumerable violence, killing, loss of life, and human beings are in deep water. At this time, an invincible soldier appeared. His name was Black Emperor. He is a man full of justice. In order to maintain justice, he practices magic skills and accidentally gets possessed by the evil forces of the Demon World. Ossa is his good brother. In order to save the Black Emperor, he launched a life and death battle with him. Finally, he awakened the kindness of the Eight Gods with the power of love and let him recover his nature! From then on, they fought side by side to maintain world peace!

"Black Emperor" is a gorgeous action fighting game!
About This game, you can use different combinations of keys to trigger different skills, such as pressing the "s "key and then pressing the"w"+"j "or "d"+"j"key quickly. It will trigger gorgeous moves. Double click the direction key to run. The e arrow adds blue and the q key adds blood. Two people can play at the same time. You can also play single player games.

Operating instructions:
Player 1: WASD key control movement, J key attack, K key jump, l key block, e key gas storage, (u,i,o) key skills;
Player 2: direction key ←→ ↑↓ to control movement, number key 1 attack, 3 key gas storage, (456) key skill.

Unique and outstanding fighting: defeat the opponent in all situations, experience the passion of fighting, give full play to potential, and send out different skills through various key combinations.

Artificial intelligence: The opponent has great strength and wisdom, and he will try his best to knock you down.
You must use your wisdom to defeat your opponent
Characters: There are many characters you can use! Each role has its own advantages
Secret: There are many secrets and surprises waiting for you to explore!
Wish: I hope you like this game, and I hope you can get happiness from this game!

name: Black Emperor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 1GHz 32-bit or 64-bit processors
  • Graphics: 128 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Inter(R)Core(TM)i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz 3.00GHz
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This is an independent game with Chinese characteristics and culture! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can experience unlimited fun and pleasure from it! It's definitely worth it! Otherwise you will regret for life!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, French, German, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Italian, Danish, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Swedish, Arabic, Spanish - Spain, Norwegian, Polish, Thai, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Vietnamese
